content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1613455712002{margin: 0px !important;padding: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1613455794610{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-color: #be9a5e !important;}”][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

IMPORTANT INFORMATION FOR OUR GUESTS REGARDING COVID-19

read more

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Accommodation

Canterbury International Hotel showcases 72 beautifully appointed, traditionally inspired rooms are all fully equipped with comfort bedding, crisp linens, flat screen TV’s and room service, wifi and 24 hour reception.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1611551199789{padding: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Standard Suites

1 Queen Bed    Book one of our traditional suites during your trip to Melbourne and enjoy both comfort and convenience. Traditional suites feature twin or Queen Bed configurations, elegant bathroom with shower. 26.8 m2

Book Now

  • Mini bar
  • Tea and coffee
  • Wireless Internet access
  • Luxurious bath products
  • Bathroom
  • LCD Television

Deluxe Suites

1 Queen Bed  Enjoy four star luxury with our beautifully appointed deluxe suite. Featuring a Queen Bed and elegant bathroom with shower. 31.5 m2

Book Now

  • Mini bar
  • Tea and coffee
  • Wireless Internet access
  • Luxurious bath products
  • Bathroom
  • LCD television

Twin Suite

2 Double Beds  Our Stylish twin suites offer tall windows overlooking looking the tranquil gardens. These suites offer, two double beds and spacious bathroom. 29.75 m2

Book Now

  • Mini bar
  • Tea and coffee
  • Wireless Internet access
  • Luxurious bath products
  • Bathroom
  • LCD television

Executive Suites

1 Queen bed  Make work pleasurable with our executive suite. With the luxury of space, the rooms feature, one Queen Bed, a spacious working desk and teleconferencing facilities. 33.7 m2

Book Now

  • Mini bar
  • Tea and coffee
  • Wireless Internet access
  • Luxurious bath products
  • Working desk
  • LCD television
  • Large bathroom
  • Electronic safe

1 Bedroom Apartment

1 Queen bed  Our one bedroom apartments provide superior 4 star amenities, designed to enhance your visit. These suites feature, two rooms with a lounge room, separate to the Queen bedroom. They also include a kitchenette and fully equipped laundry. 41.5m2

Book Now

  • Mini bar
  • Tea and coffee
  • Wireless Internet access
  • Luxurious bath products
  • Kitchenette
  • Laundry facilities
  • LCD television

2 Bedroom Apartment

1 King bed and 2 twin beds  Our sophisticated 2 bedroom apartments are spacious with a luxurious feel. The accommodation features, one king room plus ensuite and separate twin room, spacious bathroom, working desk and lounge. 44.5 m2

Book Now

  • Queen bed
  • King bed
  • Spa bath
  • Mini bar
  • Tea and coffee
  • Wireless Internet access
  • Luxurious bath products
  • Plush Bath robes
  • Kitchenette
  • Electronic safe
  • LCD television
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Most popular facilities” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Outdoors” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” el_class=”new_cust_headings”][vc_column_text]

  • Outdoor furniture
  • Sun terrace
  • Terrace

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Pets” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” el_class=”new_cust_headings”][vc_column_text]

Pets are not allowed.

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Food & Drink” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” el_class=”new_cust_headings”][vc_column_text]

  • On-site coffee house
  • Chocolate or cookies (Additional charge)
  • Fruits (Additional charge)
  • Bottle of water
  • Wine/champagne  (Additional charge)
  • Kid meals (Additional charge)
  • Special diet menus (on request)
  • Breakfast in the room
  • Bar
  • Restaurant

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Internet” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” el_class=”new_cust_headings”][vc_column_text]Free! WiFi is available in the hotel rooms and is free of charge.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Entertainment and family services” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” el_class=”new_cust_headings”][vc_column_text]

  • Board games/puzzles

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Cleaning services” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” el_class=”new_cust_headings”][vc_column_text]

  • Daily housekeeping
  • Trouser press (Additional charge)
  • Dry cleaning (Additional charge)
  • Laundry  (Additional charge)

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Business facilities” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” el_class=”new_cust_headings”][vc_column_text]

  • Fax/photocopying (Additional charge)
  • Business centre (Additional charge)
  • Meeting/banquet facilities (Additional charge)

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Safety & security” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” el_class=”new_cust_headings”][vc_column_text]

  • Fire extinguishers
  • CCTV outside property
  • CCTV in common areas
  • Smoke alarms
  • Security alarm
  • 24-hour security

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”General” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” el_class=”new_cust_headings”][vc_column_text]

  • Shared lounge/TV area
  • Designated smoking area
  • Air conditioning
  • Non-smoking throughout
  • Heating
  • Lift
  • Bridal suite
  • Family rooms
  • Facilities for disabled guests
  • Non-smoking rooms
  • Newspapers
  • Room service

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”2 swimming pools” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” el_class=”new_cust_headings”][vc_column_text]

  • Pool 1 – indoor
  • Pool 2 – outdoor

     

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Wellness” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” el_class=”new_cust_headings”][vc_column_text]

  • Fitness
  • Full body massage (Additional charge)
  • Spa Facilities
  • Sun loungers or beach chairs
  • Pool/beach towels
  • Massage (Additional charge)
  • Spa and wellness centre (Additional charge)
  • Fitness centre

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Languages spoken” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” el_class=”new_cust_headings”][vc_column_text]

  • English
  • Italian
  • Chinese

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Extra health & safety measures” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:left” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_row_inner el_class=”new_cust_headings” css=”.vc_custom_1611208439243{margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 10px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-plus-square” color=”white” size=”lg” css_animation=”fadeInLeft” css=”.vc_custom_1611206601692{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/6″][vc_custom_heading text=”Safety features” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” css=”.vc_custom_1611206408563{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 10px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

  • Staff follow all safety protocols as directed by local authorities
  • Shared stationery (e.g. printed menus, magazines, pens, paper) removed
  • Hand sanitizer in guest accommodation and common areas

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_row_inner el_class=”new_cust_headings” css=”.vc_custom_1611207010281{margin-bottom: 10px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-users” color=”white” size=”lg” css_animation=”fadeInLeft” css=”.vc_custom_1611206989890{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/6″ css=”.vc_custom_1611208223321{margin: 0px !important;padding: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Physical distancing” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” css=”.vc_custom_1611206789149{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 10px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

  • Cashless payment available
  • Physical distancing rules followed
  • Mobile app for room service

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1611206906049{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_row_inner el_class=”new_cust_headings” css=”.vc_custom_1611205167629{margin-bottom: 10px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-check-circle-o” color=”white” size=”lg” css_animation=”fadeInLeft” css=”.vc_custom_1611205213130{margin: 0px !important;padding: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/6″ css=”.vc_custom_1611205049497{margin: 0px !important;padding: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Cleanliness & disinfection” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” css=”.vc_custom_1611205444777{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 10px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

  • Use of cleaning chemicals that are effective against coronavirus
  • Linens, towels, and laundry washed in accordance with local authority guidelines
  • Guest accommodation disinfected between stays
  • Guest accommodation sealed after cleaning
  • Guests have the option to cancel any cleaning services for their accommodation during their stay

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_row_inner el_class=”new_cust_headings” css=”.vc_custom_1611205699953{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 10px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fa fa-cutlery” color=”white” size=”lg” css_animation=”fadeInLeft” css=”.vc_custom_1611205619294{margin: 0px !important;padding: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/6″ css=”.vc_custom_1611205666783{margin: 0px !important;padding: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Food & drink safety” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” css=”.vc_custom_1611205642605{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 10px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

  • Physical distancing in dining areas
  • Food can be delivered to guest accommodation

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row]
